channel.title: Amazed Retro Techzillas
channel.description:
# Amazed Retro Techzillas
![690x388 |690x388](upload://sGcrZ0y9iVMSEimRqnXniyD3ex7.png)
>Pixelart. 3000x3000px. Collection of 10 000 unique NFTs. Amazed Retro Techzilla is the official mascot of the ART token. Collection is in final design stage. Suggestions for traits are possible and more than welcomed. $ART shareholders are eligible for dividends (in $XRD) from this collection sales. First dividend payments on 31.3.2022. [How to become a shareholder.](https://radixtalk.com/t/art-token/270) ## Reservation Reservations are open for random allocation and unlimited until the marketplace opens. You will receieve a placeholder token. Once on the marketplace, sales are available trough direct orders, but limited to a selection of 100 Techzillas per day. ## Reservations address For pre-order, please send 100 XRD or multiples of 100 XRD to: rdx1qsppry9mz3jq3hn6ymh45urktsy7vmwenhq930r4eprgqadp9snucugrjvj87 --- **Price of each NFT:** 100 XRD **Links:** * [Website](https://www.ratixnft.com/) * [Contact prints preview](http://www.artistizen.com/AmazedRetroTechzillas.pdf) **Social:** * [Telegram](https://t.me/Tributjects) * [@Artistizen](https://t.me/Artistizen)

item.title: Amazed Retro Techzillas
item.dc:creator: Mattia | MattiaNode
item.description:
Amazed Retro Techzillas

Pixelart. 3000x3000px. Collection of 10 000 unique NFTs. Amazed Retro Techzilla is the official mascot of the ART token.

Collection is in final design stage. Suggestions for traits are possible and more than welcomed.

$ART shareholders are eligible for dividends (in $XRD) from this collection sales. First dividend payments on 31.3.2022.

How to become a shareholder.

Reservation

Reservations are open for random allocation and unlimited until the marketplace opens. You will receieve a placeholder token.

Once on the marketplace, sales are available trough direct orders, but limited to a selection of 100 Techzillas per day.

Reservations address

For pre-order, please send 100 XRD or multiples of 100 XRD to:
rdx1qsppry9mz3jq3hn6ymh45urktsy7vmwenhq930r4eprgqadp9snucugrjvj87

Price of each NFT: 100 XRD

Links:

  • Website
  • Contact prints preview

Social:

  • Telegram
  • @Artistizen
